EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-01-23-Field-East-RD-Sponsored-Montreal.ES-2017-12-18-Montreal-04.Send
EmailTemplate.subject: RSVP: Montreal Networking Event with Cisco and Turbonomic
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[turbonomic.com/vip-montreal]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're looking forward a fantastic evening filled with food, drinks, and of course, hockey as the Canadiens take on the Avalance. Will you join us, Cisco, and your technology peers on January 23rd?
Montreal IT Networking Event: Hosted by Cisco & Turbonomic Montreal Canadiens vs Colorado Avalanche
Bell Centre; 1909 Avenue des Canadiens-de-Montréal Montréal, QC H4B 5G0, Canada Tuesday, January 23rd 6:30pm <[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-montreal/]]>
We hope to see you there,
- The Turbonomic Team
